name: Chomp-man Dash - Construction Maze Runner
description:
SLOW DOWN! MEN AT WORK

Guide Mr. Construction Man go past across the complex construction site maze!

Control his moves by moving left,right,up and down.
Collect dots and pellets along the way without hitting on obstacles to clear the level!

Between some stages, one of the three monster or ghost in the middle will roam free in the maze.
Avoid contact with the monsters at all cost or Mr. Construction Man will wither and die!

Download NOW! and experience classic arcade madness!
